# Lentando

> Progress at your pace üê¢ ‚Äî A private, judgment-free habit and substance use tracker built for harm reduction.

Lentando is a free, open-source PWA for tracking substance use, resisted urges, and healthy habits. 
Built for people pursuing harm reduction, gradual tapering, or abstinence ‚Äî without shame or pressure.
Runs entirely in the browser. No account required. No ads. No data selling.

## Philosophy
- Harm reduction first ‚Äî any positive change is worth celebrating
- No shame, no judgment ‚Äî progress isn't always linear
- Privacy matters ‚Äî your recovery journey is personal
- Small wins add up ‚Äî every moment of awareness counts

## Key Features
- One-tap logging for sessions, resists, and healthy habits
- 50+ badges celebrating streaks, gaps, timing improvements, and mindful choices
- Visual analytics and day-by-day history
- Gentle coaching tips and alternative habit suggestions
- Optional cloud sync across devices (requires sign-in)
- Installable as a native-like PWA
- Fully offline capable

## Privacy Model
- All data stored locally in browser by default
- No tracking, no ads, no data selling
- Optional Firebase sync ‚Äî user's own data only
- Full export and delete anytime

## Alternatives
Free open-source alternative to Nomo, I Am Sober, and Sober Time.

## Links
- App: https://lentando.3d2k.com/
- Source: https://github.com/KilledByAPixel/Lentando
- Privacy: https://lentando.3d2k.com/privacy.html
- Terms: https://lentando.3d2k.com/terms.html
